changes.title: Bulk Standup Management
items: Send standup reminders to all teams at once with a single command
Post standup summaries for all teams simultaneously
Safety confirmation prompt before bulk operations
Preview which teams will be affected before proceeding
Detailed success and failure reports for each team

changes.title: Improved Administrative Tools
items: Administrators can now manage standups across all teams more efficiently
Better error handling ensures operations continue even if one team fails
Preview mode allows testing before sending actual messages

changes.title: Holiday System Improvements
items: Fixed an issue preventing holiday schedules from working correctly
Resolved errors that were blocking standup automation during holidays

changes.title: Organization-Specific Holidays
items: Each organization can now manage its own holiday schedule independently
Holidays are no longer shared across different workspaces
Better support for teams in different countries and regions

changes.title: Better Notification Controls
items: Team admins can now turn off all standup notifications if they prefer
Clearer documentation on how notification settings work
Better control over when you receive reminders and alerts

changes.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed preferences command to work as documented
Improved command documentation accuracy

changes.title: React Web Application
items: Home page with hero section, features, and how it works
Comprehensive documentation with search functionality
Changelog page with version history
Contact form with functional form submission
Theme toggle for dark/light mode support
Lazy loading for pages with loading fallbacks
Global page transitions and scroll-to-top functionality

changes.title: Developer Tools & Infrastructure
items: GitHub issue and pull request templates
Organization administrator management script (addOrgAdmin.js)
Documentation search functionality
Lucide icons integration for UI components
Enhanced responsiveness with sticky sidebar

changes.title: Architecture & Infrastructure
items: Removed legacy static HTML routes and basicAuth middleware
Replaced multiple static routes with single-page application (SPA)
Refactored documentation sidebar navigation to use external docs.json
Updated Node.js version requirement to 20.19+ or 22.12+
Improved Slack manifest update script with better error handling
Enhanced Tailwind CSS configuration and styling
Restructured UI components for theme-aware styling

changes.title: Deprecated
items: Web frontend application static files
Legacy HTML routes and basic auth middleware
Unnecessary console log statements

changes.title: Manual Standup Controls
items: Send standup reminders manually anytime, not just at scheduled times
Post standup summaries for any past date
Preview standup summaries before posting them to the channel
Send follow-up reminders to team members who haven't responded yet

changes.title: Smarter Permissions
items: Team admins can now manage their teams more easily
Commands are context-aware - no need to specify team name when you're already in the team channel
Better error messages when you don't have permission to perform an action

changes.title: Better Late Submission Handling
items: Late standup submissions now appear in the channel even if no summary was posted yet
Your late submission won't be lost - it creates a new post if needed
Multiple late submissions are neatly organized in a thread

changes.title: Admin Leave Management
items: Team admins can now set leave for team members
Manage leaves for your entire team from Slack
Use @mentions to quickly set someone's leave status
View all upcoming leaves for your team members

changes.title: Smarter Standup Posting
items: Bot now skips posting if no one on the team is available
Team members who opt out of mentions won't be shown in 'not responded' lists
Cleaner standup summaries with better formatting

changes.title: Initial Release
items: Automated daily standup reminders
Team management commands
Leave tracking system
Timezone-aware scheduling
Work day configuration
Standup response collection via modals
Team standup summaries
Late submission threading
User preference management
Admin role management
Multi-tenant organization support
PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
PM2 process management
Health check endpoint
Comprehensive documentation
